document.discussion_title: Trooper: One Dead In Sumter Crash | wltx.com
document.topic_text: Trooper: One Dead In Sumter Crash wltx 10:10 PM. EST August 11, 2016 File photo CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST Sumter, SC (WLTX) One man is dead after a single car collision in Sumter according to the South Carolina Highway Patrol. Lance Cpl. Judd Jones said that the driver, John Cord Winburn Jr., 84, of Bethune was traveling west in a Nisssan Altima on McCray's Mill road when the vehicle left the roadway and struck a tree. He was not wearing a seatbelt and was pronounced dead at the scene.
